reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 15/02: SUBSECTION 7(2) OF THE ACT - MEANING OF EMPLOYEE
reg_info.reg_name_text: SUBSECTION 7 (2) OF THE ACT — MEANING OF EMPLOYEE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 15/02: SUBSECTION 7(2) OF THE ACT - MEANING OF EMPLOYEE
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation Act, 1999   Loi de 1999 sur la Société des Loteries et des Jeux de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 7 (2) of the Act, “employee” means an employee who is a permanent and full-time employee of the Corporation. O. Reg. 15/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 7 (2) of the Act,

“employee” means an employee who is a permanent and full-time employee of the Corporation. O. Reg. 15/02, s. 1.
